subtitle.translate: A specialized version of the ME Crafting Terminal designed to encode Blank Pattern into Crafting Pattern or Processing Pattern.

description: A specialized version of the /b/ME Crafting Terminal/b/ designed to encode /b/Blank Patterns/b/ into a /b/Crafting Pattern/b/ or /b/Processing Pattern/b/. It also Lets you browse the contents of your network like other terminals, but also contains an area for designing patterns.
There are two modes for pattern encoding. /b/Crafting Patterns/b/, and /b/Processing Patterns/b/.
/b/Processing patterns/b/ are designed for use with /6/machines that do not use standard crafting recipes/6/; such as furnaces, or other machines.

To select between modes, click the button to the right of the interface; when it shows a standard crafting table, it will create /b/Crafting Patterns/b/, and when it shows a furnace, it will create /b/Processing Patterns/b/.
